title: Short-Term Intensive Programming Competency Enhancement Course Using Educational Robotics

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic programming concepts and foundational experience in robotics system operations
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning and individual project execution via mobile-based microlearning platforms in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Demonstrate basic competencies in algorithm design and debugging through robot control programming.
Apply creative programming strategies in the STEM-integrated problem-solving process using educational robots.
Execute programming collaboration procedures required in real-world work environments through team-based robot projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
